DOC.brief_summary: To determine change quadriceps muscle function follow application ice compression knee .
DOC.detailed_description: Novel rehabilitation method , specifically target decreased muscle activation due joint pathology prior strength training , elicit great improvement muscle function self-reported disability compare traditional therapy . Preliminary evidence suggest apply cryotherapy joint prior exercise increase quadriceps activation . It unknown apply cryotherapy intermittent pneumatic compression also increase quadriceps force output voluntary activation . The purpose study determine change quadriceps force output voluntary activation follow application cryotherapy compression . The investigator hypothesize increase quadriceps force output voluntary activation follow application cryotherapy compression .
DOC.criteria: Age 1565 year BMI < 30 Candidate arthroscopic knee surgery address meniscus pathology arthroscopic knee surgery within past 2 year . Participants outside age range Ligamentous insufficiency repair Participants traumatic spine low extremity injury within past 6 month Participants previous adverse reaction electrical stimulation cryotherapy ( i.e . burn , hypersensitivity ) Medical condition would contraindications electrical stimulation transcranial magnetic stimulation , include cardiac pacemaker , metal implant head , current pregnancy , neurological disorder , history seizure Participants unable give consent unable understand procedure experiment .
